website_summaries.verdict: A color Xerox printer with enough functionality for home and office, personal, or professional use.
pros: Advanced color and image correction features make it easy to get the best print results right from the printer
Document scanner and copier works directly from the printer
cons: Initial installation can take some time due to the required drivers and unclear instructions

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to use!!!
customer_reviews.text: The software that this comes with is next to impossible. We still cannot get it to scan. Tried calling customer support for assistance and was on hold so long that I had to hang up. Before the person transferred me I explained that I cannot get this thing to work because its to complicated and he kind of chuckled. They must be getting a lot of calls like this.
customer_reviews.author: E. Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: All I've had is problems. I hired a professional to come install for me, 12 hours later still no scanning. It just simply won't work. Called the company, get sent to a different phone number, they never answer or return calls. It constantly goes "offline" and will take 15 or 20 minutes of restarting the machine to get it back online, this drives me nuts. So far, I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Arthur

customer_reviews.title: NEED a power cord
customer_reviews.text: bought this printer for my son for Christmas. Unfortunately there was NO power cord, leaving the printer useless. I have called both Xerox and Amazon several times. Xerox says this is Amazon's problem because they bought it through a client of Xerox. Amazon says not their problem it's Xerox's problem. So here we sit with an expensive, useless printer for Christmas. I am so disappointed in both Xerox and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Kontra

customer_reviews.title: Just after the one year warranty the scan portion died
customer_reviews.text: Great PRINTER... copy/scan feature is junk. I bought this as a home MFP and produced 129 "images". Xerox wants 260 for the first half hour and 65 each 15 there after... I can buy the exact same doorstop for that price... Xerox is no longer even on my shopping list let alone the most recommended printer/copier company. Once the toner runs out I'll be donating the carcass to hazardous waste.
customer_reviews.author: amateur biker

customer_reviews.title: very good quality and speed!
customer_reviews.text: As i expected from Xerox, they deliver. So far so good. The print and scan quality if VERY good, for both text and photos. The setup is a little of a pain, once you move to beyond the basics, like setting up Gmail for scans... But still, it's pretty good, web-enabled interface. The local display is ok, although i would not recommend anything, but basic setup on it, then move to the web-based. A very good quality machine, that feels sturdy, works well, and prints beautifully! I would highly recommend if you want a good quality scanner/copier/color printer all in one, network-enabled, and feature-rich.
customer_reviews.author: Grzegorz Tokarski

customer_reviews.title: A Crappy Printer
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRINTER. This printer is a piece of crap. Receive today 6/15/20 @ 1.30pm couldn't get it to work and wifi couldnt connect. Started calling tech support at 2pm to 6pm and was unable to get through. Disgusting. I have ups picking this up as im not about to cart this to them in this huge box. BUYERS BEWARE this is a awful printer and tech support is a f@#ing joke. My whole afternoon wasted on this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is my second color laxer printer. The last was a Canon and a complete disaster. This printer reliably shows up on the network. The driver’s are in Windows so prints reliably. It goes to sleep and wakes up reliably. I can print to it wirelessly from my phone. The color accuracy for photos as an example isn’t great but for documents, presentations, stuff from the web it works great. I would recommend it for a small business or established home.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R. Smedstad

customer_reviews.title: Reliablity Problem?
customer_reviews.text: Good print quality, network scanning difficult to configure but the tech support hotline is very helpful and no long wait times. The user interface is pleasant. I would give it four stars but my printer stopped working after four weeks of use. A technician is supposed to show up tomorrow to troubleshoot the problem, the on-site support is appreciated, but I'm bummed that I'm having problems with the printer so quickly, makes me question the reliability.
customer_reviews.author: WHP

customer_reviews.title: Just out of warranty - Repair more than buying a new one and it won't be a Zerox
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping a "business" printer would last more than a year as a personal all-in-one. Only 25% of the original toner cartridges used and 20 scans made (see pics). The scanner and copier now leaves a one inch wide band down the center of the page (see pic). Replacement parts to replace the scan unit costs more than the printer so I'll go back to Brother. My Brother all-in-one lasted over five years and needed repaired but decided to buy a new one and I went with Xerox. Never again. I thought Xerox was known for its quality and longevity, hope yours lasts longer if you bought one.
customer_reviews.author: Nobody Special

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Best Amazon Purchase Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for personal use. Absolutely quick setup and no issues so far. 8/14/20. Only issue so far is one of my pages was turned a complete different color for some reason. Hint: If it ask for admin password it’s the serial number on the back of your printer. If you have trouble printing from your computer double check you don’t have multi printers listed for Xerox. If so then print test page from each printer to see which one is connected to your current printer. Don’t forge to download the program and drivers from the CD provided even though you’re using WiFi. ✌🏾Good Luck!
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: jams consistently with 3x5 index cards
customer_reviews.text: According to the manual and the specs, the xwc 6515 should print on 3x5 inch index cards fed from the bypass tray. But the machine will typically print two or three pages (cards) of the job and then jam. After the jam is cleared it jams immediately on subsequent attempts to continue the job. After an overnight rest it will usually print another two or three cards. I've tried the cardstock, light cardstock, and glossy cardstock settings on the printer. The performance is the same in all cases.
customer_reviews.author: S. W. Davison

customer_reviews.title: A fine product at a LOW PRICE
customer_reviews.text: We bought a Xerox WorkCentre 6515/DNI 3 years ago to get out of an expensive Xerox printer contract that had a monthly fee of $250. The new Xerox lasted 3 years until we got a failure notice and stopped working. We considered trying to get it repaired locally but there was no local tech support. A new Xerox WorkCentre cost about what a service call would cost so it was a no brainier to just buy a new one from Amazon. We did and it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Dillenberger

customer_reviews.title: Vivid colors. Very fast. Supports Linux!
customer_reviews.text: Using inkjets for so long, I'd forgotten how fast a laser printer can be, and two-sided printing hardly slows it down! Colors are vivid on all types of paper. It's not a photo printer, but results are quite acceptable for casual use. Scanning is also very fast -- especially two-sided scans through the document feeder. I'm using it on my home network with Windows and Linux clients (Linux Mint 19.3). Linux drivers are easily found on the Xerox website.
customer_reviews.author: Pantaz

customer_reviews.title: I regret purchasing this mfp
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my home office and from day one there has been issues. Xerox tech support is in another country and they are clueless as to how to help. I call them at least once a week for an average of 4-6 hours. My issues are the following: Can't scan to computer or email. Printer toner error. Wifi
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Good Printer and Copier
customer_reviews.text: Much more reliable and easier to use than the Canon I replaced. It it still a bit of a challenge to quickly figure out what settings to use if you use something other than stock paper, such as envelopes or bond. Perhaps there is a quicker way and I just have not figured it out. As a typical printer/copy machine, this unit excels.
customer_reviews.author: Earth Trekker

customer_reviews.title: Great MF Printer!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this printer to replace a Ricoh Color printer which was causing a lot of headaches. The setup was not easy since I did not use the unaccompanied disk because of recent updates. The colors are marvelous and prints very fast. I love the scanning which allows me to directly scan to our servers. All-in-all, if you keep up with required maintenance. I highly recommend this printer.
customer_reviews.author: Kambizm

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: The network loses connection frequently. The printer has to be deleted and added about once per week. It doesn’t recognize using the manual feed tray. Sometimes the driver will not allow two sided printing and needs to be deleted and reinstalled. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but problems
customer_reviews.text: When it works it does a good job but it is not very reliable. Too many problems. I would never purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Stan H.

customer_reviews.title: Paper Tray Problem
customer_reviews.text: 10 months after buying this unit, the main paper tray feed failed. It was fixed under warranty, but 6 weeks later (just out of warranty) it failed again. 4 months after the warranty expired, the machine is making a horrible grinding noise and is fully inoperable. We will not pay to have this fixed, nor will I buy another unit from Xerox.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Connectivity problems
customer_reviews.text: Severe problems with network connectivity, or at least as to the scanning function. That is, I can print all day long via the wifi adapter, but basically am forced to use a USB drive to scan. Otherwise, scans good and prints good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Print and Features
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I had with the printer is they still weigh a ton (takes two to move it) and set up was more complicated than it could have been (the touch screen is very hard to use for data entry). If there was a USB (or ethernet) quick start that would saved time. Oh - and the default PW is the serial number - but it only tells you that the first time you set up. Once you get past that step you have no clue - all the on-line notes say 1111, 5222 and others used on different models. Seems like this issue has bounced around every other model.
customer_reviews.author: Jack G

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice copier, which is what we're using it for. One annoying thing, is that if it is "off" or asleep for awhile and you start a new copy "job," it prints off a printer-details page EVERY single time. Maybe I can find a way turn off this setting eventually... Very heavy machine, requires 2 people to move it.
customer_reviews.author: Amz Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great photo quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a brother and HP laser printers and was never happy with the photo quality. As a Realtor, I needed to make sure my head shot and house photos look great and this printer delivers it, each and every time. This printer shows true color, even using non-Xerox replacement brand toners. The manual paper tray can hold 50 pieces of paper for those non every day printing like cards, envelopes, flyers. Love this printer! Great job Xerox
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast and clean
customer_reviews.text: So far I am loving this printer, it seems that my family will get more use out of it than I will, I mainly just wanted a full duplex color printer, and this one meets all my expectations, the quality is much better than my previous Brother ink jet.
customer_reviews.author: Patience404

customer_reviews.title: Great Print Quality
customer_reviews.text: Recieved and set up myself. It was easy works great. A bit slower than I expected but the quality is wonderful. I did not have any issues getting it set up or connected, I did have an earlier model I used for years.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: A little on the technical side to get set up but once I figured it out I am extremely happy with it. I printed 50 posters on card stock with about 40% blue coverage and it only used about 25% of the cyan cartridge. Very easy on toner.
customer_reviews.author: H. Marcus Grey

customer_reviews.title: Bad software and support
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely do not buy this printer. Inherent software issues that Xerox IT group can't figure out. Total waste of many hours, all for not as printer had to be returned. Bought a replacement, Brother's that out of the box in 30 minutes everything was fully operational and functioning. Sorry Xerox.... fix your products!
customer_reviews.author: steve c

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly for set up.
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back. After 10+ hours with “experts” still would not scan or print Word documents. Great copies. Navigating Xerox web page for the proper drivers is not a East task. Went back to the slow printer I bought at &Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Goodspeed

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely terrible software
customer_reviews.text: The print quality is decent (when you can get it working), but the software running on the printer is absolutely horrendous. It took several tries to get WiFi working, a number of features such as SFTP scanning, email, etc. simply do not work. Each time a useless error message like “an error has occurred” or something else in broken English is displayed. The only explanation I can think is that Xerox simply did not even test most of the features for the printer before shoving it into a box and shipping it to customers. Absolutely do not recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Printer
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice printer. It was very hard for me to set it up to use with an older Mac. But my new Mac and all my android tablets and phones were very easy to set up and use with this printer.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Williams Jr

customer_reviews.title: WENT BAD AFTER 30 DAYS. XEROX IS NO HELP!
customer_reviews.text: Great printer while it worked for 30 days! It’s been down for 2 weeks. Xerox keeps coming out changing everything from the logic board to the toner channel and still no go. Now they say it’s bad cartridges which is their own toner. They can’t replace them because they are on back order!!! DONT BUY THIS UNLESS YOU WANT A TEMPORARY PRINTER!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Goes off warranty in a week
customer_reviews.text: The product went off warranty 9 days after it arrived. Stopped working wireless and could not find network even when plugged directly in. Amazon was nice enough to replace the printer.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Adam Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Nice pro - grade printer
customer_reviews.text: After initial trouble (I had to return the first of the two printers because it was delivered defective), I now got the printer running and it is doing well. It is fast, not too noisy and with its large display really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Draese

customer_reviews.title: $350.00 PAER WEIGHT
customer_reviews.text: MACHINE IS 1 MONTH OUT OF WARRANTY AN RECEIVED AN ERROR CODE. HAS HARDLY ANY USE ON IT - STILL USING THE ORIGINAL STARTER TONER CARTRIDGES. MACHINE IS STUCK IN AN ERROR STATE AND WILL NOT DO ANYTHING. SUPPORT WILL COME OUT AT $200+ PER HALF HOUR AND LOOK AT IT!!!!! I BOUGHT XEROX THINKING IT WAS WELL MADE. FIND A DIFFERENT BRAND......
customer_reviews.author: MNMOORE

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY XEROX
customer_reviews.text: I own a computer business ... Have used dozens of printers over the years. This has been my worst experience. Got fooled by the name. Never got to use it. Got 062-380 error code. XEROX knows exactly what it is. But they do not talk to you unless they have your credit card. DO NOT BUY XEROX!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for homeschool
customer_reviews.text: My wife has homeschooled before it was cool and we have been through our share of printers. This has been the easiest and fastest yet. What a value for the function. This really simplifies making workbook copies for 2page >> 2 page
customer_reviews.author: Jamie D. Rabenstein

customer_reviews.title: Good printer.
customer_reviews.text: Good printer, print good quality, setups little confusing, but overall when it setup properly works good, a lot of options to scan. Wi-fi option is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Arkadiy

customer_reviews.title: Careful with this one!
customer_reviews.text: Xerox, for whatever reason, made the toner containers have all kinds of crap on the chips that aren't needed. The printers and toners come from different "regions", then they don't work. IT's a major problem many are complaining about. The engineer how came up with this idea needs fired!!!! Expect to waste larges amounts of time when ordering toner.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Mechling

customer_reviews.title: Great printer. Never use for pictures or photos🗑 .
customer_reviews.text: Great printer. Workhorse. Fast. Crisp. Prints photos like TRASH. We bought this to assemble a proposal for the state. It was fast and able to handle the work no problems. Even with heavy paper types. However, Every single image we printed had streaks and was just piss poor at best. We thought it was the image but another printer did just fine. I love this printer but it is pure trash for images or pics.
customer_reviews.author: B.K.

customer_reviews.title: Good value printer
customer_reviews.text: It works and helped our little non profit out in a jam. Prints well enough, a pain to get set up to utilize all the functions. I wouldn’t recommend it for heavy work loads.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C

customer_reviews.title: DON'T EVER BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this thing a negative number if I could. I had this for 1 year and 4 days and the scanner went bad on it. Cost almost as much as the printer to fix. Then 2 months later I got a fatal error code. Their tech support pages and personnel are worthless!!. These printers are only good for use as a boat anchor. I will never ever buy a Xerox product again, and will tell anyone I know including my office never to buy there sh1t worthless products.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Nash

customer_reviews.title: Terrible! No instruction not even the admin password
customer_reviews.text: Terrible instructions. Terrible customer service. This thing goes offline every 10 mins. Tried some of the suggestions online nothing works. I have to restart it every time I want to print. Just wasted $400’
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: This what level of printer we needed for our home offices. We had outgrown the other types of All-in-one printers. This printer works well with the app as well. It was a great investment so far.
customer_reviews.author: Apostle Thonor

customer_reviews.title: Like wasting time ? Buy this
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful print quality, but it has the dumbest energy saver on it. Every time you go to use it it shuts off you have to get up and then it back on. Makes it horrible
customer_reviews.author: chris hanley

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine is excellent. Very easy to set up. It works flawlessly. Scan, print, email direct from machine. I’m very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Peter DiFilippo

customer_reviews.title: When It Works, It Is Great
customer_reviews.text: The WorkCentre 6515 is great when it works; the copies and scans are fabulous. Unfortunately I spend too much time trying to track down the errors. No tech support so you will have to figure out what the problems are for yourself. I have had many Multifunction printers and this is both the best and the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Randal Torgerson

customer_reviews.title: Shipping issues
customer_reviews.text: Box was damaged and packing loose from machine inside. also rear door had come off one side at the hinge. I repaired the door and seems to be working ok but wanted to note it. I tried the chat but it was useless. The printer was also very dirty where the box was damaged like it was in a dirty location. Again, machine seems to be working ok but wanted to have it noted somewhere in case it fails later. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: A.N. Casto

customer_reviews.title: Best Printer Yet
customer_reviews.text: We have been through 3 Canon and Lexmark printers that just can't hold up. So far this Xerox has been amazing. Just bought another monochrome version for the warehouse. The screen is typical responsive touch, just be patient between clicking buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Sr

customer_reviews.title: What a great printer for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely incredible printer for the price. It fulfills every need printing copying and scanning.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Print is excellent. Unit was off lease.
customer_reviews.text: The unit had a hard time picking up and printing envelopes. The roller should have been replaced before the unit was sold as refurbished. Still that is the only thing wrong with it. I am pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tennie White

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Software
customer_reviews.text: I have been fighting this printer for several hours to try and print off wi-fi. I has lost of issues. It only prints the original test page when is starts up, and it prints this page every time it gets turned on. I wish I would have read the reviews on this. This printer is a waste of time and money. I had to walk off and try it again another day. This is my fifth printer like this and my first and last Xerox one.
customer_reviews.author: Brian N

customer_reviews.title: Not a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.text: Had to have warranty repair after 5 months. Now 16 months in, the scanner no longer functions and the warranty has expired. Not a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: ooshwa

customer_reviews.title: Not all features are easy to setup.
customer_reviews.text: Dislike that one feature we wanted is the scan to pdf. Still not able to get it working. Very poor instructions and zero support. We’re contemplating returning!
customer_reviews.author: S. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: I love this printer
customer_reviews.text: A great printer at an even better price. Everything you need to get printing out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: its a good product... strongly recommend... easy to setup and works very well over the wifi
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great printer.
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and easy to use. Way better than my old HP. I love xerox and wanted when the hp went out. Hp had issues due to bad ink sold by amazon so watch that. But xerox works and Bluetooth super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Fast, quiet and can print from phone.
customer_reviews.text: I love my new color laser printer because it is fast and quiet and I can print right from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Multi-function printer
customer_reviews.text: Fast, looks good, doesn't break the bank delivering quality, and supports linux.
customer_reviews.author: idget

customer_reviews.title: Great performance and value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great unit. I am a businessman and have owned hundreds of printers. I will continue buying this model. It is trouble free and priced right.
customer_reviews.author: Steve@mcp

customer_reviews.title: Poor setup
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to setup. Will only print from web. Support services appears to not be available on weekends which is terrible cause that’s when I do my most work
customer_reviews.author: Thee

customer_reviews.title: Duplex Scanning
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this machine. It was repaired once and replaced once for the duplex scanning. Now 15 months after replacement the duplex scanning has failed again. I like to think Xerox's motto is "You can by better,but you can pay more for it". Once the toner cartridges are empty it will become an expensive door stop!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lindberg

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Jammed twice before even printing a single page. Does not wake from sleep, scanning from PC does not work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SUPERIOR PRINTER
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I'm biased, for sure, since I have owned or leased Xerox full size copiers for 20 years. This little printer is a superior printer. Hint, as a Mac user, always download the latest driver from the Xerox site. Try to use ethernet and you'll be smiling!
customer_reviews.author: E. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Wished I'd bought a $69 throw away
customer_reviews.text: Hasnt worked properly out of the box. Connectivity stinks. Problem with auto paper sensor which is common. Freezes up often...
customer_reviews.author: don g kelly jr

customer_reviews.title: Not Plug N Play
customer_reviews.text: You will need some IT experience to setup scanning. This is not a Plug N Play printer . I went to Xerox website and watched a tutorial that helps me get it setup. Call center hours makes it hard to call tech support
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Felps

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product advertised
customer_reviews.text: If you order this, you get a WorkCentre 6515/DN You will not receive a WorkCentre 6515/DNI This has been my experience 3 times in a row.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby L. Stucky

customer_reviews.title: Great products highly recommend it have had no issues whatsoever ...
customer_reviews.text: Great products highly recommend it have had no issues whatsoever since I've bought it and I use it every day at the office
customer_reviews.author: Digiecard

customer_reviews.title: Lousy tech support
customer_reviews.text: Lousy tech support. Never got the printer to work properly. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Vernon

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: A truly terrible printer right out of the box. Xerox needs to return to the drawing board! Good riddens to that junk. Bought an HP and totally five star satisfied. Yes, it was almost twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D Singer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding for Home and Business
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. High quality printing. Great photos on photo stock paper. Color is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jean B Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Decent printer for money
customer_reviews.text: When I bought my first xerox 6515 the WiFi connection didn’t work so I had to replace it. The new 6515 seems to work just fine. The startup and shutdown could’ve been a bit quicker. It’s a decent printer for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Verify if there is a person in your area to assist with setup before purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to setup. Unable to find anyone in my area to assist with setup. With what I was able to setup myself, has been a decent printer.
customer_reviews.author: Heather A Hammons

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well, difficult to set up some of the email and scan connectivity
customer_reviews.author: Dan Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Useless as a network printer
customer_reviews.text: REGRET this purchase! EVEN our IT guy has had enough of this unit. It prints nice when it stays on the network. The interface and scanning do NOT work!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Callaghan Lau

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: I had to hire an expert to get all the computers hooked up
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Oleas

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!!!!
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE!!! Don’t buy it. Is too hard to set it up. The scan doesn’t work, just print one side of the page. DON’T BUY IT
customer_reviews.author: Lizandra Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: This machine has a mind of its own!!!
customer_reviews.text: Will never purchase this item again! Fax portion does NOT work at all. It is very very slow at coping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working several months after purchase after only light use. Won't power on.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Paper
customer_reviews.text: Everything works great except for how much paper it holds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: never worked! paper jam is all it would ever say
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great all-in-one!
customer_reviews.text: Finally bit the bullet and bought an all-in-one laser printer!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry D.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Installation went well and after 3 weeks of use it seems to meet all of our needs and expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE WORST PIECE OF CRAP EVER MADE
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE WORST PIECE OF CRAP EVER MADE! I purchased it as an upgrade to the brother inkjet printer that i previously used in my home office. That was a horrific mistake. It fails to print 8 of every 10 times that my wife and I try to use it. The scanning function takes AT LEAST 3 passes to get it right. Worst of all, calling Xerox customer service has only compounded the frustration. They are completely clueless about solving the problems with this machine (even when I have been "ELEVATED" - what a crock!) and the lack of caring about solving your problem comes through loud and clear. Why does Amazon even carry such an inferior product???!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ellerton Castor

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but issues since we purchased it for our office. It's on our network and our IT guy cannot seem to keep it running properly either. I would not recommend this product. Wish I would have returned it while I could have.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Green

customer_reviews.title: This product is horrible. I have only had it for 1
customer_reviews.text: This product is horrible. I have only had it for 1.5 months just shy of the amazon warranty. It does not work properly. Will not finish a print cycle. Shuts off and then reprints from the beginning. Steer clear of this machine if you do not want to waste your time and money. We purchase a lot of printers from amazon and never have experienced this before. Extremely disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not window 10 compliant
customer_reviews.text: None of the drivers from the CD and online wont install on the OS 10. Called Xerox and they wanted to charge me for assistants. screw that, i spent about 1000 on this printer and attachments. I ended up sending it back and went for a bother color laser printer.
customer_reviews.author: OTP Tech

product_meta.title: Xerox WorkCentre 6515/DNI Color Multifunction Printer, Amazon Dash Replenishment Ready
product_meta.description: Style:PrinterIt’s time for an affordable color multifunction printer like the Xerox WorkCentre 6515 designed from the ground up to work with smart phones and tablets. Print wirelessly from your phone or tablet. Or scan documents and send them to a mobile device, network, email or FTP site. Scan documents to or retrieve and print documents from the Cloud using the free Xerox Mobile Link app. Do not place objects on the power cord. Temperature (operating) : 41 - 90 ° F (5 - 32 ° C).
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One Xerox WorkCentre DNI Color All-in-One Printer | 1Cyan, 1Magenta & 1Yellow cartridge of 1,000 print capacity, 1Black cartridge of 1500 capacity | Documentation CD, Installation Guide, Power & Fax cord

Printer dimensions – 16.5” W x 19.9” D x 19.7” H | Printer Weight – 67.7 lbs. | Scan up to – 37 ipm (black) & 21 ipm (color) | Duplex copy feature up to – 9 cpm (black) & 8cpm (color) | Please refer to product documents for more specifications

With just a few simple steps your multifunction printer is ready to scan or print directly to or from the cloud, Scan to Email, FTP, Network or somewhere more down to earth - like the integrated front and rear panel USB ports

Our latest color touchscreen interface offers an app-based, tablet-like user experience with gestures and multi-touch interactions, Customize it to match your workflow and navigate with intuitive, smartphone-like swipes and gestures
Save 10% on all ink reorders with dash replenishment, upon activation your printer measures ink levels and places smart reorders when you are running low, no subscription fees, cancel anytime
